Hello and thank you for purchasing Low Poly Gems And Rocks.

All the prefabs are set to static.

There are 403 prefabs.

- There are 6 Example Scenes with Static Game Objects and Post-Processing Bloom Effect. 
The Example Scenes are set to work with Universal Rendering Pipeline. 
Assets are easy to convert for other templates too. 
Lighting is set up to Mixed Lighting - Realtime Direct and Baked Indirect.

Lightmaps are generated on import.

Update 1.1 Added Rock Set 4. Added new example scene.
Update 1.2 Updated package to Universal Rendering Pipeline. Added Rocks Set 5 and new example scene.

Contact me on issues:
a3deve@gmail.com
